description.short: Plan and navigate the brainstorming process
description.full: Meet Idea Coach, your personal brainstorming companion designed to inspire creativity. With a fun and collaborative tone, Idea Coach helps you plan and navigate the brainstorming process, making sure you stay focused and on track. Idea Coach is designed to work with Microsoft 365 Copilot.

localizationKeys.agentDescription: Idea coach is a brainstorming agent.
localizationKeys.agentCSText1: Hey Idea Coach, help me brainstorm about a specific topic.
localizationKeys.agentCSText2: Hey Idea Coach, I need help planning a Brainstorming session.
localizationKeys.agentCSText3: Hey Idea Coach, can you help me find fun exercises for my Brainstorming session?
localizationKeys.agentCSText4: Hey Idea Coach, can you help me find tools to organize ideas?
localizationKeys.agentCSText5: Hey Idea Coach, can you give me some feedback on my session?
localizationKeys.agentCSText6: Hey Idea Coach, can you help me improve my skills for Brainstorming sessions?
